caption.p: Molecular characterization of recombinant proteins. MM: protein molecular marker; (1) SDS-PAGE; (2) Western blot using anti-dengue positive serum pool; (3) Periodic acid-Schiff staining: ( A) NS1DENV1, ( B) NS1DENV2, ( C) NS1DENV3, and ( D) NS1DENV4. Arrowheads show the glycosylated form of the NS1 protein.
